info.name: LinkFlow AI - Workflow Automation Platform
info.description:
Complete API collection for LinkFlow AI - a production-ready workflow automation platform (n8n/Zapier alternative) built in Go.

## Setup Instructions

1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Create an environment with these variables:
   - `baseUrl`: http://localhost:8080
   - `accessToken`: (will be set after login)
   - `refreshToken`: (will be set after login)
   - `workspaceId`: (will be set after workspace creation)

## Authentication

Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication. After logging in, the access token will be automatically saved to the environment variable.

## Rate Limiting

Default: 100 requests per minute. Rate limit headers:
- X-RateLimit-Limit
- X-RateLimit-Remaining
